topic.title: How to Avoid Wrapping the Title Text Without Indentation

body.p: By default, the chapter and section number is on the same line as the title content. If the title is too long, the text wraps to the next line without any indentation.

p.codeblock: 4.5.5 This is a long title text that wraps.

body.p: If you want the wrapped text to include indentation:
body.codeblock: 4.5.5 This is a long title text that wraps.
body.p: then you need to set the value of the args.css.param.title.layout transformation parameter to table. This results in the number being placed in one cell while the rest of the title content is in another cell with wrapped text.
